intro.default: This is your schedule. It instructs PROXIMO what transactions to simulate. You can review the schedule here, modify it, or delete a scheduled transaction that shouldn't be executed anymore. As a reminder: PROXIMO is not connected to your banking account, and it does not run any real transactions on your behalf. PROXIMO is a simulation tool that lets you simulate transactions that you can predict in the future.

intro.ledger-tab: Click here to have a look at your forecasted ledger
